Educational_Institution_RuleObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Educational_Institution_RuleObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Student_Articulation_Rule_Data.description: If multiple Educational Institution Courses are specified with different Unit Types, this Unit Type will be used when evaluating the minimum threshold of units earned from the external courses.

validation.validation: Ensure conversion rules exist for every unit type represented in the external courses to the Preferred Unit Type. These unit types are missing conversion rules: [Unit Types].

Student_Articulation_Course_Data.description: Student Articulation Course Use Maximum Units

validation.validation: For each rule, select Use Maximum Units for all Internal Equivalent courses except one.
You must either select No Internal Equivalent or complete the Internal Equivalent section.
Specify transfer credit reasons that belong either to the same institution as the transfer credit rule, or the institution associated with the academic unit hierarchy of the transfer credit rule.

Specify a transfer credit condition rule that belongs either to the same institution as the transfer credit rule, or the institution associated with the academic unit hierarchy of the transfer credit rule.
Educational Institution Courses must belong to the Course Catalog of the Educational Institution.
You can either add a transfer credit rule for a different Effective Date or edit the rule for the current date.
To create a transfer credit rule with a Minimum Unit Threshold, specify a Preferred Unit Type that is used by at least 1 of the external courses.
You can only submit a Preferred Unit Type for rules that specify a Minimum Unit Threshold that is greater than 0.
There is no Academic Unit Configuration for the Academic Unit and Academic Level you've specified. Specify an Academic Unit and Academic Level with an Academic Unit Configuration.
Specify only 1 of these options: Program of Study, Academic Unit, or both an Academic Level and Academic Unit.

Specify a unique rule. A rule already exists for this combination of the external educational institution and associated course along with the academic unit hierarchy: [Educational Institution], [Educational Institution Courses], and [Academic Hierarchy].
